title: What are the simplest pleasures in life, and what defines a simple pleasure? - Quora

response.answer_text: The simplest pleasures: 1. A conversation that is full of soul. Warm tea and rain. A group of creatives who come to be lifelong friends. The trivialities of acquaintances: book clubs and music suggestions, theater performances or movie. 2. Using something to it’s full capacity: A bottle of perfume that smells like wildflowers, a pencil that writes like a dream, a piece of cloth, an underlined book, a weathered sweater. 3. Being regular at a local cafe that brews excellent french pressed coffee or drip coffee. Something for the eccentrics, where the barista recognizes you every Saturday and calls you by name. Reading a newspaper by a window table. 4. Photographing, being photographed. Filling all your online spaces with beautiful pictures. Remembering the best moments of your life. Journalling. 5. Adventures in a bout of recklessness. Camping goods. To know the sweet woods, to travel well. Rough boots and well-worn limbs. Ragged breath and absolutely spectacular sunrises. Treehouses and waterfalls. 6. To ride a bicycle down cobbled streets to the farmer’s market, or simply to take a walk in a lovely white shirt, with a brown bag for the groceries. The purchase of herbs and organic vegetables. Growing thyme on the sill. 7. Cooking green, and cooking well. Making your own herbal concoctions. Sharing recipes the old way, handwritten with excellent penmanship. Writing letters to people on their birthdays. Being well-worded and educated. Knowing how to give a good speech. 8. Hugs. Golden Retrievers. Independent cinema. Poetry readings. Bookstores. Acting. Falling in love with strangers. 9. Sleeping below the nightsky, shivering beside someone you love.

Get my headphones on my ears and let the beats reach my eardrum!Sitting on the window seat and feel the burst of air on my face!Make a drawing or craft work for my sister.Roaming in the garden, be it hostel or home!Getting to see the increase in number of views on my Quora answers.Singing with utter disregard to lyrics and tune!To see my best friend’s message notification pop up on the screen.To sleep on the ground, specially when it’s summer.To stand in waist deep sea water, only to be carried away towards the beach by the current.To see a child eating with your money.To see your mother smiling after a long time.To hear, “ Well done, son!”To jog and witness the sunrise in front of you.To give advice to a junior.To help a friend with a subject before exams.To cut off from my schedule and go for adventure sports.To get to close my eyes after a hectic day.To see a dog resting it’s head on my lap.To write a handwritten letter to a friend.To sit in meditation and find myself!Thank you!
